intro: Modiolastrum, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is native to southern Africa and is characterized by its silvery-gray leaves and daisy-like yellow flower heads. The plants typically grow in arid or semi-arid environments, showcasing their adaptability to harsh conditions. Modiolastrum species are often used in ornamental gardening due to their attractive foliage and flowers. They are also valued for their ability to thrive in poor soils and require minimal water once established.
